title: A Night in the Garden - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 2/15/19
itunes:title: A Night in the Garden - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 2/15/19
description:
Guest host Ian Punnett and an open lines caller discuss the Academy Award nominated documentary film "A Night in the Garden," about a Nazi rally that was held in Madison Square Garden in New York City in 1939.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
